price: donde se les dirá: "Esto es lo que desmentían y rechazaban".
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
